text.div:
Substitution Status

CodeDescriptionCommentVersion
0 No product selection indicatedadded v2.3.1
1 Substitution not allowed by prescriberadded v2.3.1
2 Substitution allowed - patient requested product dispensedadded v2.3.1
3 Substitution allowed - pharmacist selected product dispensedadded v2.3.1
4 Substitution allowed - generic drug not in stockadded v2.3.1
5 Substitution allowed - brand drug dispensed as a genericadded v2.3.1
7 Substitution not allowed - brand drug mandated by lawadded v2.3.1
8 Substitution allowed - generic drug not available in marketplaceadded v2.3.1
G A generic substitution was dispensed.added v2.2
N No substitute was dispensed. This is equivalent to the default (null) value.added v2.2
T A therapeutic substitution was dispensed.added v2.2

name: v2.0167
title: v2 SUBSTITUTION STATUS
description: FHIR Value set/code system definition for HL7 v2 table 0167 ( SUBSTITUTION STATUS)

concept.display: Substitution allowed - patient requested product dispensed

designation.value: Substitutie toegestaan - patiÃ«nt vroeg om verstrekte product

concept.display: Substitution allowed - pharmacist selected product dispensed

designation.value: Substitutie toegestaan - apotheek selecteerde verstrekte product

concept.display: Substitution allowed - generic drug not in stock

designation.value: Substitutie toegestaan - generieke medicatie niet op voorraad

concept.display: Substitution allowed - brand drug dispensed as a generic

designation.value: Substitutie toegestaan - merkmedicatie verstrekt als generiek

concept.display: Substitution not allowed - brand drug mandated by law
Substitution allowed - generic drug not available in marketplace

designation.value: Substitutie toegestaan - generieke medicatie niet beschikbaar op de markt
Er is een generiek substituut verstrekt

concept.display: No substitute was dispensed.  This is equivalent to the default (null) value.

designation.value: Er is geen substituut verstrekt. Dit is de standaardwaarde.
Er is een therapeutisch substituut verstrekt
